author: Tony Lee
title: CA Gov. Newsom: Stimulus Checks to Illegals ‘Being Considered’
description: California Governor Gavin Newsom (D) is reportedly considering issuing cash payments to the state’s illegal immigrants as part of a Golden State “Disaster Relief Fund” for the state's illegal immigrants, according to a Wednesday Associated Press report. | Pol…
content:
